tweet.html: RT @StateDept: Today, @HistoryAtState announces the release of newly digitized versions of 17 volumes from the #FRUS series, the official documentary record of U.S. foreign relations. These volumes cover events that took place between 1886 and 1899. go.usa.gov/xnzaZ
